reg_pit.title:
Fee for Copy of Information
in the Current Assessment Notice Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 52/2016, effective March 2, 2016.

reg:regulation.reg:title:
Fee for Copy of Information
in the Current Assessment Notice Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: The fee, referred to in section 6 (5) of the Assessment Act, for a copy of the information contained in the current assessment notice is $6 per parcel of land referred to in the assessment notice.

reg:content.reg:regnote: Note: this regulation replaces B.C. Reg. 61/81.
reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Assessment Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 20, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 6 (5)]
